index.html.title: JeremyAnsel.Xwa.HooksConfig
index.html.keywords: JeremyAnsel.Xwa.HooksConfig JeremyAnsel.Xwa.HooksConfig is a .Net library to handle X-Wing Alliance's hooks files.
